About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

Bio

I am a self-taught developer from Pennsylvania. I currently work as a Devops Engineer for RobertHalf. While learning to code, I worked my way up from Technical support to a .net developer position. I used my free time to learn html, css, javascript and eventualy C#! I would never be where I am today if it wasn't for my family and mentor. Learning is a passion of mine that will never end.

Front End Development

WPF HTML CSS

I love working with Front End technology. Being able to create something people can see and interact with is very rewarding. I started out with basic HTML and CSS. I learned CSS Flexbox and CSS Grid technology. I also work with WPF(Windows Presentation Foundation) on a daily bases with the XAML markup language.

Back End Development

C# JSON JAVASCRIPT

Back End developers are cruical to any application. They are as important as the foundation of a house. I am a .net Developer and work very heavily with C#. I use it to make solid foundations for my applications. Json to convert into Json classes and started to learn Javascript recently.

Microsoft Bot Development

LUIS MICROSOFT BOT FRAMEWORK

Machine learning and BOT development is an exciting technology to be apart of. Utilizing the Microsoft Bot Framework, I am able to create a user friendly experience utilizing Luis, C# and adaptivecards to understand and fulfil user needs.
